events.name: GDG Balkh Opening Ceremony
events.description:
GDG Balkh has been announced! The 1st event in Balkh province will take place on 13 February 2020.

Google developers Group Balkh is a new chapter of the GDG in Afghanistan, now Balkh developers have the opportunity to meet local developers with similar interests in technology.

GDG-Balkh meetups include talks on a wide range of technical topics where you can learn new skills through hands-on workshops. The community prides itself on being an inclusive environment where everyone and anyone interested in tech - from beginner developers to experienced professionals - all are welcome to join.

GDG Balkh Opening Ceremony Agenda
(30min) 1:30 - Registration & Networking
(10min) 2:00 - welcome (Niyaz khairy)
(10min) 2:10 - Code, Learn and Grow Together as a community (Jawid Mowahed GDG Kabul Organizer)
(15min) 2:20 - GDG Balkh (Shahir Hossaini & Niyaz Khairy)
(20min) 2:35 - Artificial Intelligence with TensorFlow (Dr.Yama Ramin)
(20min) 3:05 - coffee break and networking
(15min) 3:25 - Angular (Shahir Hossaini)
(20min) 3:40 - Make your software development easy with google technologies
(15min) 4:00 - Material Design (Rateb Ghiasy)
4:15 - Group photo & Goodbye

Date: Thursday, 13th February 2020
Time: 01:30PM - 04:15PM
Venue: Balkh University New Campus, ITCB (Information Technology Center of Balkh)

events.name: IWD20 (Women Techmakers balkh)
events.description:
Afghan Women Techmakers!
If you don't know how to connect with Women Techmakers in Afghanistan and the world and have no plans yet to come up with good ideas, now is your chance to connect with the new world of technology and expert ladies of technology from your homes and take the first step to achieve your dreams.
Google supports and welcomes women's participation in technology in Afghanistan and around the world through a variety of events. Women Techmarkers (WTM) is one of Google's global programs for women to support them by holding conferences, presenting ideas, and developing their achievements in the field of technology to facilitate access to new resources.
WTM Balkh is launching its first online event through the YouTube window, providing all women with the opportunity to subscribe to their homes. Don't miss the opportunity today is your day!

group_profile.intro: I am the founder of ZerOne magazine, the first technology e-magazine in Afghanistan. And now I`m working as a UI/UX designer at Saawis software development company.

organizers.name: Shahir H.
organizers.bio: I am a full-stack web developer at Saawis, a lecturer at Aria University. I am passionate about Angular and Web technologies.

group_profile.intro: Shahir Hossaini is a senior web-developer in Saawis development company and also he is also a lecturer at Aria.
